wda-ps-detail: The real beauty, healthy skin, and confidence lie in the balance and harmony of the body.
uneven: Uneven skin tone is a major problem for women.
dvn story: DVN's story begins with the exploration of beauty inside and out for women. We believe that every woman has the right to define her own beauty, which is not only external but also stems from inner strength. At the same time, we are committed to encouraging women to bravely pursue their inner beauty and strength, free from any standards and definitions.
dvn core: DVN's core values ​​lie in advocating the combination of beauty and strength, and encouraging women to unleash their inner beauty and power.We are dedicated to providing women with nutritional beauty solutions that not only focus on skincare but also help women achieve confident growth and influence.
dvn adheres: DVN adheres to the globally leading beauty concept, combining the concept of nutritional beauty with revolutionary skincare solutions, to bring women a comprehensive beauty experience from the inside out. Our products integrate top-notch patented technology globally, aiming to provide women with safe and effective beauty solutions.
dvn original: DVN's original intention is to offer women more choices, allowing them to confidently define their beauty and strength. We hope to inspire women's confidence and courage from within through our products and concepts, empowering them to be the masters of their own lives.
dvn mission: DVN’s mission is to help women unleash their inner beauty and power through nutritional beauty solutions, enabling them to grow in confidence and bring about change through influence.
dvn vision: DVN’s vision is to become a leader in women’s beauty and strength, providing safe and effective nutritional beauty solutions for women worldwide, allowing them to shine in their self-defined beauty.
leading technologi: Leading Technology: We integrate top-notch patented technology globally, providing safe and effective nutritional beauty solutions.
inner and outer: Inner and Outer Balance: We focus on women's inner beauty and strength, striving to enhance women's overall beauty from the inside out.
product our: Our products and services are customized according to individual needs, meeting the beauty and health needs of different women.
we upload: We uphold the combination of beauty and strength, encouraging women to bravely pursue their inner beauty and strength, free from any standards and definitions.
maintains: Maintains skin firmness and elasticity with collagen formation and repair
nourishes: Nourishes skin cells so that the skin barrier is stronger
viqua: Unique technology where Vitamin C acts as a stabilizer, strengthens the natural bond of Vitamin C and Amino Acids, along with other components in a chewy candy texture to ensure better absorption. This combination helps collagen molecules and pigmentation achieve better results together.
discover our: Product description: Easy-to-take chewable tablet, made with premium and patented collagen formula. D.V.N Chewable Tablet is crafted for women who want to maintain their skin's youthful appearance and health. The tablet includes natural ingredients that help with skin elasticity, hydration, and a radiant look. It combines Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid, and other key ingredients in a convenient format for everyday use. Whether you're at home or on the go, this chewable tablet makes it easy to support your skin from the inside out.
